content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
There are two production facilities in use for refining raw resources:
  
### Iron Plate Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of a furnace used for converting iron ore (with coal) into iron plates.

### Copper Plate Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a furnace (designated as a copper furnace) used for converting copper ore (with coal) into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Function Call Mismatches – The get_entities function is being invoked with unexpected arguments (using a keyword ‘radius’ in one instance and multiple positional arguments in another). Verify that calls exactly match the expected signature and validate the return value before iterating, using an empty list fallback if needed.

• Lab Placement and Inventory Verification – Multiple attempts to place a Lab at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5) failed because no Lab was available in inventory. Confirm resource availability before invoking placement actions.

• Crafting Prerequisite Shortfalls – Lab crafting errors arose from missing sub-ingredients (for example, shortages in iron‐gear‐wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables). Check that all cascading production requirements for a lab are met (including availability of base ingredients such as iron-plate and copper-plate) to avoid repetitive crafting failures.
